sentences.en: A computational formula for determinant of generalized circulant matrices is put forward.
sentences.cn: 进一步得到了广义循环矩阵的行列式的计算公式.

sentences.en: A study of its property and determinant theorem is made.
sentences.cn: 本文就就其性质和判定作了一些探讨.

sentences.en: Another determinant that must be observed by you are interactions and reactions.
sentences.cn: 另一个你必须观察的决定因素是相互作用和反作用。

sentences.en: Caused by a change in a determinant other than price.
sentences.cn: 由价格以外的决定因子的变化而引起.

sentences.en: Consumption was affected by permanence income which is determinant.
sentences.cn: 持久收入是影响消费的决定因素.

sentences.en: I used this to remember how to calculate the determinant of a matrix.
sentences.cn: 我就用过这个方法来记住怎么算矩阵中的决定因素。

sentences.en: If all elements in one row or one column are zero, the determinant is zero.
sentences.cn: 如果一行或一列中的所有元素均为零, 则行列式为零.

sentences.en: In this paper , we discuss determinant of minor matrix and accompanying matrix.
sentences.cn: 讨论子式阵及伴随阵的行列式,得到了高阶伴随阵行列式的一般公式.

sentences.en: Is cost or reliability the main determinant in choosing a new car?
sentences.cn: 在挑选新车时,决定性因素是价钱还是可靠性?

sentences.en: Objective To investigate the determinant of recurrence in mural ameloblastoma.
sentences.cn: 目的研究影响壁性成釉细胞瘤术后复发因素及刮治术后复发病例观察.

sentences.en: The determinant can be evaluated from the cofactors of any column.
sentences.cn: 行列式可根据任何一列余因子来求算.

sentences.en: The main stem and fruiting branches of determinant types remain relatively short.
sentences.cn: 有限生长类型的主茎和果枝仍然较短.

sentences.en: The molecular weight of the determinant was 17500 Dalton by SDS - PAGE analysis.
sentences.cn: 经过SDS -PAGE 电泳分析,这个含有抗原决定簇的蛋白质片段分子量为17500道尔顿,斑点免疫试验证实该片段具有生物学活性.

sentences.en: The second, among the constrictive factors, economic is determinant factor.
sentences.cn: 在制约公民政治参与的多种因素中, 经济是决定性的因素.

sentences.en: The term " continuant " arises from a relation between this type of determinant and continued fractions.
sentences.cn: “ 连行列式 ” 这一名称来自于这种类型的行列式与连分式的相互关系.

sentences.en: This determinant is a special case of the resultant of two polynomials.
sentences.cn: 这个行列式是两个行列式的结式的特殊情形.

sentences.en: We should distinguish the square bracket from two straight bars enclosing a determinant.
sentences.cn: 我们应将方括号与用以围住行列式的两条直线区别开.

phrases.tran_cn: 决定因素；[石油]行列式因子

trans.tran_cn: 决定物，决定因素，行列式，免疫因子
trans.tran_en: something that strongly influences what you do or how you behave
